Overall negative sentiment percentages for Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services and Value over the years:

Cleaniness: 0.0%
Amenities: 0.0%
Location: 0.0%
Services: 0.0%
Value: 0.0%

Suggestions for Improvement:

Cleaniness: Increase cleanliness standards at the property by increasing staff for maintenance and sanitation projects.
Amenities: Expand the range of amenities offered by investing in additional services and facilities.
Location: Try to improve the accessibility of the property by providing clearer directions and improved transportation connectivity.
Services: Increase the level of customer service by appropriately allocating resources and hiring additional personnel.
Value: Offer more competitive prices with discounts or value-added services to remain competitive in the market.
